footer.description: FlowKan helps you organize your work and team visually and efficiently. Simplify project management and achieve your goals.
footer.title: Contact

error.id: Cannot generate link: board ID is not defined.

link.text: Generate an invitation link that you can share with anyone.

AI.prompt:
Act as a project management assistant and task organization expert. Your goal is to generate a complete and detailed description for a new task card based solely on its title.
          The response should be concise, formatted as a checklist and/or detailed steps, resembling a pencil sketch for quick planning. The description should be detailed enough to guide task execution.

          Generation criteria:
          Analyze {{title}}: Identify the objective, subject, and main action.
          Generate structure for {{title}}: Create a list of steps (- [ ]) or sections that anyone would need to complete the task.

boardsItem.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this board?

emptyList.p2: Do you want to create one?

features.title: Key Features
features.viewTask: Easily view and manage your tasks
features.jobsTeam: Work with your team in real time effortlessly
features.upToDay: Stay updated on your project progress
features.filesDescription: Attach files and audio directly to your tasks

first.text: This app has transformed how we manage our projects. Absolutely essential!
first.user: Ana García, CEO at Company X

second.text: The interface is incredibly intuitive and collaboration features are next level.

third.text: I never thought task management could be so simple and visually pleasant.

management.title: Project Management
management.message: From small teams to large enterprises, our tool adapts to your complex project management needs.

planning.title: Event Planning
planning.message: Organize every detail of your events, from logistics to invitations, visually.

monitoring.title: Personal Tracking
monitoring.message: Manage personal tasks, goals, and daily habits with an easy-to-use Kanban system.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: For personal use and small teams getting started.

pro.title: Pro
pro.description: Advanced project management for growing teams.

business.title: Business

pricing.billing: All prices are per user/month, billed monthly.
